product_display_name: Inkfruit Mens Chain Reaction T-shirt
description:
1. 100% cotton

This t-shirt depicts the typical Indian-ness which cannot be found anywhere in the world. This is India and people live in unconditional harmony in this land.

Those nice fabrics, the cool colours, the easy and relaxed Fit are few of the things that come to mind when one thinks of t-shirts. Be it little kids, college goers, the not-so-young or the oldies, everybody loves t-shirts. The perfect casual wear ever created by man. So easy to wear and comfortable. The popularity of t-shirts is soaring and it so seems a life without a t-shirt is unthinkable for some. It's a no holds barred addiction people just can't get rid of. The multitude of colours, designs, fits and sizes that t-shirts come in are a tribute to the the astounding craze for t-shirts. The eternal favourite for one and all. Go for your t-shirts right away.

This unique fabric has been dyed/ printed using traditional dyeing processes. Some colours may initially transfer when in dry or wet contact with light coloured fabrics or upholstery. This transfer will reduce after a few washes but we recommend that you wash the product separately for the first few washes.

fabindia specialises in natural, craft-based contemporary pieces, while also providing rural craft persons a platform to use traditional dyeing and fabric printing techniques. With the essence of Indian roots, crafted with a focus on the traditional, this stylish shirt sets the tone for an all-new trend for men. Wear this with denims or chinos.

product_display_name: Timberland Unisex Rubber Sole Brush Shoe Accessories
description:
This handy brush is an essential tool for taking care of nubuck leather footwear. It erases stains and brushes away dirt from suede, nubuck, leather and canvas. One side features a gum rubber eraser and the other a nylon bristle brush all molded in the shape of a timberland boot outsole.

Method of application

  • Use the brush side to remove loose dirt or dried mud
  • The gum rubber side is for erasing stubborn dirt and stains
  • Then use the brush side to raise the nap
  • 3¼ inches in length

product_display_name: Crocs Dora Boots Pink Sandals
description:
Originally designed for boaters and fishermen to have a firm foothold even on slippery surfaces, crocs has gone a  long way in creating footwear for those who demand comfort. Replete with several benefits such as the shoe moulding to your feet using the body warmth, it's a hot favourite among most people. The midsole band found in all of crocs footwear is a tribute to the classic vulcanized style of yesteryear footwear. Incredibly easy to clean, Crocs makes for a great footwear when working in the garden or in wet and messy conditions.

The speciality of these shoes are that they need to Fit loosely around the feet, such that neither the sides of the shoe nor the toe unit come in contact with the feet. Instead, there should be a quarter to half inch gap between the foot and the wall of the shoe, and you should be able to comfortably fit a finger between the heel and back strap.

Upper
EVA upper with textured inside for lightweight feel, comfort and durability
Dora explorer themed upper for added style
EVA material that moulds to the foot shape offering ample ergonomic comfort
Perforations on the forefoot and the sides for ventilation and to drain away water
Back strap to support the ankle and hold the foot in place
Upper moulded to midsole for comfort and protection of feet from abrasion
Broad EVA lining along the midsole for enhanced durability
Branding button on upper for style

Midsole
EVA footbed with horizontal and lines in the silhouette of the foot for ergonomic comfort and acupressure
Crocs branding on mid heel for comfort and style
Fungus, bacteria and odour resistant for a healthy wear even in wet conditions
Mild heel cup on the footbed to support the heel

Outsole
Slip resistant outsole
Multi-directional textured leaf-shaped grooves in the forefoot and backfoot for ample grip, stability and comfort

Shoe care
Rub surface with clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash

product_display_name: Nike Men Air Rift MTR White Casual Shoe
description:
The nike Air Rift MTR for men with its split-toe for a customised Fit and incredible lightness is a favourite among comfort junkies who love sport. The shoe is made out of tough jersey material, and the bottom of the shoe has two channels that separate the ball of the foot from the rest. The Air Rift has an open top, and allows air to pass through the split-toe. There is light lycra fabric under the split toe and it breathes well. It also has a heel strap, so there is open air here as well. The padding on this shoe is designed for optimal grip.

Upper
Fabric upper with a four-way stretch mesh
Split toe for a customised fit
Articulated forefoot
Hook-and-loop closure on the midfoot area
Ankle strap at the back with a velcro closure
Soft, removable sockliner to accommodate an orthotic

Midsole
Full length, sculpted Phylon midsole for absolute shock absorption and lightweight comfort

Outsole
Air-Sole unit in the heel
BRS 1000 Waffle outsole with a modified forefoot

Shoe care
Wipe surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash or store in direct sunlight

product_display_name: Nike Men's Lunarswift Black Shoe
description:
EXPERIENCE THE JOY OF FRESH RUNS

An absolutely dynamic running shoe, the nike Lunarswift+ offers seamless comfort, distance-busting cushioning and runner specific support. Offering soft cushioning and support with every stride, the nike Lunarswift+ features a LunarLite cushioning system that ensures a springy effect for the feet.

The Nike Lunarswift+ range of shoes a low profile midsole that ensures a firmer feel to the underfoot. It&rsquo s a highly recommended shoe for underpronators and overpronators with ample cushioning and stability provided in the medial and lateral side of the shoe.

Breezy touch to snug shoes

With a stitchless upper, Nike Lunarswift+ shoes reduce irritation to the feet and enhance the comfort factor. The upper of these shoes are constructed using lightweight synthetic mesh and synthetic overlays ensuring ample ventilation for the feet, keeping them dry and comfortable even during long runs. To test the breathability aspect, wear really thin socks and move around in the Nike Lunarswift+ and feel the breeze moving in and out. Added to this is a robust heel counter that provides an absolutely snug and secure Fit to the rearfoot.

Adapts to the runner's needs

Light in weight and weighing just about 306 grams, this range of shoes are employed with Lunarlon cushioning system in the midsole that is made up of a soft, resilient foam core. This is encased in a supportive foam carrier ensuring a lightweight blend of plush cushioning and springy response. This support platform is dynamic enough to respond to the runner&rsquo s changing needs. It adopts to the wearer&rsquo s stride through each run giving the right amount of support and stability.

No wonder overpronators prefer the Nike Lunarswift+ as the wedged carrier foam in the Lunarlon system limits excessive pronation, without adding weight or stiffness of a traditional medial post. When it comes to neutral pronators, this pronation control feature is not activated. For such runners, the dynamic support platform enhances cushioning, converting this same shoe into a neutral running shoe.

Stay safe in the dark

The outsole of the Nike Lunarswift+ has flex grooves along its length and breadth ensuring flexibility in every stride. Constructed with an outsole using environmentally preferred rubber and a waffle pattern outsole, the shoe is absolutely high on traction and durability. Added to these features are the reflective elements used in the shoe to ensure that you are visible even when running in low visibility conditions, keeping you safe.

Belonging to the Nike+ range, the Nike Lunarswift+ is compatible with all Nike+ products and actually talks to your iPod nano and other compatible guaging devices. So enjoy those long runs through all seasons in this pleasurable range of Nike Lunarswift+ shoes.

Wash care
1. Brush surface with damp, clean cloth to remove dust
2. Do not machine wash

product_display_name: Nike Women Glide White Grey Shoe
description:
GLIDE THROUGH DAILY RUNS

An update of the most successful nike LunarGlide series, the nike LunarGlide 2 running shoes is one of the most advanced running shoes you can ever find in the market. One of the most responsive shoes for people of all types of gaits, the LunarGlide performs excellently even under tough conditions besides looking absolutely stylish. This makes it an ideal shoe for a wide range of runners, including underpronators and overpronators.

An all-rounder for all runners

The Nike LunarGlide 2 is engineered with extra cushioning across the length of the shoe, with special focus on the areas of the foot that need that extra support and comfort. This makes the LunarGlide 2 a hot favourite among runners who prone to impact related injuries as it not only enhances shock absorption, but also provides a solid base that helps you spring with every stride. The LunarGlide 2 has a Lunarlon system in the midsole that adds on a plush cushioning to absorb shock protecting the feet, besides adding that extra spring in gait. This adapts to your running style and offers complete support, making it one of the safest running shoes to pick especially if you are not too sure what kind of a gait you have.

The Nike LunarGlide 2 shoes are constructed with a lot of mesh on the upper to ensure ample ventilation for the feet and keep them dry and comfortable even during long runs. The shoeliner is employed with a unique climate control system that keeps the shoe itself dry and fresh wicking away moisture, ensuring that your feet are free from blisters.

On the whole, the stylish design and comfort factor together have always kept the Nike LunarGlide range of shoes at the top of the priority and favourite list of runners the world over.

Upper

  • Breathable mesh upper with Flywire technology and bonded seams for improved support
  • Lace-up closure for a secure Fit
  • Reflective elements for enhanced visibility
  • Cushioned sock liner for superior shock absorption
  • Synthetic knit laces for longevity

Midsole

  • Lunarlon midsole provides extra cushioning and comfort

Outsole

  • Flex grooves on the outsole enables flexibility of the feet
  • Non-marking rubber outsole helps provide traction and durability

Wash care
1. Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
2. Do not machine wash

product_display_name: Being Human Men Grey Dial Blue Strap Watch
description:
Uber cool and stylish, this limited edition analogue wrist watch from Bollywood superstar Salman Khan's NGO, being human, is designed for those who love heavy metal style. Stylish to the T with a sporty look, it's a great addition to your wardrobe.

Case diameter: 50 mm
Case thickness: 15 mm
Dial shape: Round

  • Stainless steel and fibre case with rubber strap for enhanced durability, comfort and style
  • Rubber strap in mat finish with branding for enhanced durability, comfort and style
  • Fixed stainless steel silver and black coloured bezel, with 15, 30, 45 and 60 markings and select minute markings in steel for added durability, style and easy time measurement
  • Fibre holders fixed to the dial with stainless steel screws
  • Metallic tang clasp with branding to hold the watch in place like a buckle, and for style
  • Silver grey dial with black border
  • Fluorescent blue time markings with only '6' and '12' numbered, and white minute markings
  • Luminous hands and index markers for visibility in low light conditions
  • Vertical date and horizontal day box in 'T' shape at '3' mark
  • Branding below '12' mark
  • Japanese movement technology for enhanced durability and accurate time measurement
  • Metallic crown to adjust date/day/time
  • Stainless steel back with brand logo and main features of watch
  • 10 ATM water resistance tested using the equivalent static depth rating, with resistance at 50 meters, allowing you to use it even when snorkelling, skin-diving, and swimming

Upper
Breathable mesh upper with a nearly seamless construction for ample ventilation and reduced irritation

FitSole cushioning for ultra-lightweight, springy cushioning and soft, responsive shock absorption

Outsole

Waffle pattern for maximum traction, with a scooped heel for extra cushioning

product_display_name: Reebok Men's Easytone Inspire White Shoe
description:
SANDY WALK FOR SHAPELY LEGS

Emulate the feel of walking on sand and shape up your legs and butt with reebok EasyTone Inspire shoes. An absolute hit with those who love that to-die-for body, the reebok EasyTone Inspire sneakers are fitted with balance pods in the outsole that create that mild instability to help you strengthen key muscles of your shins, glutes and feet, and burn those extra calories in style.

Moving air that burns calories

Optimized with Moving Air technology, this shoe activates key muscles in the calves and quads, reducing overall body stress. This innovative fitness shoe is engineered with built-in balance pods in certain points that transfer air in response to your stride. Such air movement creates micro instability with every step you take, forcing the leg muscles to work harder, increasing strength and endurance similar to what happens when walking on sand. Added to this is the DMX Shear cushioning in the Reebok EasyTone Inspire that absorbs shock on impact, enhancing comfort for the feet even during long runs.

Added to the DMX Shear technology is the traditional foam base that makes the sneaker three times softer and helps you burn more calories. Even better is its SmoothFit leather and mesh upper that is practically devoid of seams, allowing your feet an abrasion-free ride.

The Reebok EasyTone Inspire is also fitted with a removable polyurethane foam insole that absorbs shock and provides ample support to reduce foot fatigue. This also allows you to replace it with an orthotic for desired comfort.

With anti-microbial linings covering the insole, you can be rest assured that while you're toning up your legs and butt, your feet are kept dry and fresh, safe from odour and moisture build-up, making it an absolute comfort to walk in.

Upper

  • Mesh uppers with synthetic overlays for lightweight breath ability
  • Padded collar and tongue for superior Fit and comfort
  • SmoothFit seamless design ensures minimal rub and decreases irritation
  • Removable, antibacterial sockliner easily accommodates orthotics
  • Lace-ups for a snug fit

Midsole

  • EVA midsole for cushioning and better shock absorption

Outsole

  • EasyTone's pockets of moving air technology promote micro-instability thereby helping to improve muscle tone in the glutes, calves and hamstrings
  • Non-marking rubber outsole

Wash care
Wipe surface with soft, clean, damp cloth to remove dust
Do not machine wash
